details.excerpt: Vasanth is one of the founders of Locatable, a new startup aiming to help people find the best places to live. He oversees development of Locatable's product and user experience. Locatable is his first startup, designed to demonstrate the power and utility of using data to help inform people's decisions about moving home. Before Locatable, Vasanth studied physics at Cambridge University, graduating in 2009. He has previous experience in the software industry, working with the latest web technologies, engaging with customers and leading a team of consultants/engineers to deliver entire software solutions.
details.description:
Vasanth is one of the founders of Locatable, a new startup aiming to help people find the best places to live. He oversees development of Locatable's product and user experience. Locatable is his first startup, designed to demonstrate the power and utility of using data to help inform people's decisions about moving home. Before Locatable, Vasanth studied physics at Cambridge University, graduating in 2009. He has previous experience in the software industry, working with the latest web technologies, engaging with customers and leading a team of consultants/engineers to deliver entire software solutions. @vsubramanian

vasanth@locatable.com
